page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
ALTHOUGH I HAVE COORDINATED THIS PROJECT,THE MAIN BULK OF THE WORK HAS BEEN DONE BY THE FIRST AND SECOND FORM PUPILS OF THE SCHOOL.SOME OF THEM HAVE THEIR NAMES PRESERVED FOF POSTERITY ON THIS DISC,BUT THE VAST MAJORITY OF THEM FELT THAT TO PUT ALL THEIR NAMES ON THE PAGE WOULD HAVE TAKEN UP TOO MUCH VALUABLE SPACE.WE HAVE ALL ENJOYED DOING THE WORK THAT HAS RESULTED IN THIS CONTRIBUTION TO THE DOOMSDAY PROJECT,AND WE ONLY HOPE THAT FUTURE GENERATIONS FIND IT AS USEFUL AS WE DO THE ORIGINAL DOOMSDAY BOOK.
DAVID J. HUTCHESON
HEAD OF HISTORY
ST. HELENA SCHOOL.
